description:
The young, studly Marcus Mojo is ready to show off what he's been working on; his muscles.

He's still one of the nicest, most genuine performers we've come across over the years.

For this scene, this hunk will be delivering sensual stroking action while lying in bed, while reading a porn mag on the porch, and finally finishing himself off on the side of a nearby creek.

Enjoy!
title: Working That Cock Out
